casebody.data:
Gerald CHARLESTON, petitioner,
v.
BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGO, et al. No. 13-1155. Supreme Court of the United States June 2, 2014.

Case below, 741 F.3d 769.

*2720Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.
